# Transform your product copy from an afterthought to an asset
Systemize and integrate text across every stage of product development and ship better products, faster.
[**Book a demo - >**](http://dittowords.com/<https:/calendly.com/ditto-team/ditto-chat?utm_source=landing_page>)[Get started for free](http://dittowords.com/<https:/app.dittowords.com/>)
![Screenshot of Ditto web-app, Figma plugin, and terminal using our Ditto CLI.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb84e8c68f67b29553103fa/6040501a1acdda7e8f080b91_hero.png)
Used by world-class product teams at
![ebay logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb84e8c68f67b29553103fa/6194176cf00a92fc0d198d5a_ebaylogo.png)![microsoft logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb84e8c68f67b29553103fa/60ee0005cc321bbb0d2a6207_microsoft.png)![mcafee logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb84e8c68f67b29553103fa/60ee001553992c5dfab169cc_mcafee.png)![rakuten logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb84e8c68f67b29553103fa/62f4488098e3d8597975ec84_rakuten%20logo.png)![Staffbase logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb84e8c68f67b29553103fa/602710e6add01c23257bd4e9_staffbase.png)![big commerce logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb84e8c68f67b29553103fa/645d6075e89a40d36be00c4d_bigcommerce.png)![root insurance logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb84e8c68f67b29553103fa/60edfff9704792fa1799175d_root.png)![uber carshare logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb84e8c68f67b29553103fa/645d60bad18d8ab3b763a9a7_uber%20carshare.png)![immutable logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb84e8c68f67b29553103fa/645d62a622c070012b801def_immutable.png)![curology logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb84e8c68f67b29553103fa/60edffede9010b14c2be5d39_curology.png)![step logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb84e8c68f67b29553103fa/61941ac964c4c834d5cf8aa7_steplogo.png)![stash logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb84e8c68f67b29553103fa/62f513fdbe7e7edb9ef6c310_Stash_Logo_Midnight%402x.png)![zero logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb84e8c68f67b29553103fa/647b77a25e854d08d109a58a_zero.png)![own up logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb84e8c68f67b29553103fa/645d61691f00c930d5dc7636_ownup.png)![happy money logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb84e8c68f67b29553103fa/619418721553cf2f3513b52c_happymoneylogo.png)
Still have questions or want to chat with us about how Ditto could work for your team? Book a demo [here](http://dittowords.com/<https:/calendly.com/d/x3fm-b8gx/ditto-demo?month=2022-09>).
## Your team's end-to-end source of truth
One centralized system to connect **product, design, and development teams** around one product text repository.Integrations across tools make it easy for everyone to stay on the same page.
![Workflow in Ditto with tools for drafting, design, editing, and development.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb84e8c68f67b29553103fa/60402285266d16804eedf523_end%20to%20end.png)
![Collaboration in Ditto with edit history, authorship, comments, and attaching to components](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb84e8c68f67b29553103fa/60402ae9abcdab4bcc44590b_built%20for%20collaboration%20crop.png)
# Built for collaboration
Copy workflows that bring in teams without slowing anything down. No more messy copy docs, confusing back-and-forths, or endless copy/paste. Create a reusable text library, centralize feedback, and integrate wherever the work is happening.
# Ship better products, faster
Unlock the ROI of product text. Say goodbye to outdated copy scattered across documents, sheets, mockups, and tickets.Ship **clear, consistent, effective product copy** faster and with more confidence.
![Parallel work process for writing, design, and development with Ditto](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb84e8c68f67b29553103fa/604022853d61b354adeb10e3_parallel%20work.png)
### Tools for everyone who touches product copy
##### Writers
![pen emoji](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb84e8c68f67b29553103fa/60412167a789c912e572eda1_penemoji.png)
Build a reuseable text component library, manage text in mockups, and collect stakeholder feedback.Reduce the back and forth knowing that your text will get synced to both design and production.
[Learn more ->](http://dittowords.com/</writers>)
##### Designers
![paint palette emoji](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb84e8c68f67b29553103fa/6041216cb0420a76986f0c8b_palette%20emoji.png)
Our two-way Figma sync makes sure that the right copy is always in your mockups. Use our Figma plugin to quickly edit text in designs and track progress.
[Learn more ->](http://dittowords.com/</designers>)
##### Developers
![laptop emoji](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb84e8c68f67b29553103fa/60412174849a6e2b431ea48a_computeremoji.png)
Our API, CLI, and SDKs allow developers to fetch up-to-date product copy and integrate it into their build processes.No more copy/paste and tickets to fix typos.
[Learn more ->](http://dittowords.com/</developers>)
##### Localization
![Globe with meridians emoji](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb84e8c68f67b29553103fa/60c12e1da0830665423f2145_globe-with-meridians_1f310.png)
Ditto serves as a single platform for all of your product‚Äôs text. With automatic integrations into both design and development, localization is organized, collaborative, and efficient.
[Learn more ->](http://dittowords.com/</ditto-for-localization>)

### Ditto: Streamlining Product Copy Management

**Overview**  
Ditto is a San Francisco-based startup founded in 2019 and is part of Y Combinator's Winter 2020 batch. The company has a compact team of 13, led by Group Partner Dalton Caldwell. Ditto focuses on enhancing collaboration across product, design, and development teams by managing the copy from conception through to production.

**Mission**  
At its core, Ditto aims to transform how teams handle written content in product development. By creating a centralized system for text management, it allows teams to ship products faster and more effectively.

**What They Do**  
Ditto offers a suite of tools designed for various stakeholders involved in product development: 

- **Writers:** They can build a reusable text component library and manage changes smoothly to reduce back-and-forth communication.
- **Designers:** Through a Figma integration, designers can edit text within mockups easily, ensuring that updates are tracked and applied consistently.
- **Developers:** With access to an API and CLI, developers can pull the latest copy directly into their builds, minimizing manual errors and typos.
- **Localization Specialists:** Ditto automates localization processes by integrating localized text efficiently with both design and development efforts.

The platform claims impressive results, highlighting that teams like Stash have saved over 12,000 hours per year by utilizing Ditto, speeding up their development processes by 20%.

**Current Focus**  
Ditto serves as a comprehensive repository for product text which acts as a single source of truth for teams. By eliminating the chaos of scattered documentation, Ditto facilitates collaboration and ensures clarity and consistency in product copy. 

**User Base**  
Over 8,000 teams currently use Ditto, including renowned companies like eBay, Microsoft, and Uber. The tool is particularly valuable for organizations looking to systemize their product copy processes and improve collaboration between cross-functional teams.

**Explore More**  
You can learn more about Ditto's offerings, request a demo, or get started for free by visiting [Ditto's website](http://dittowords.com). 

In a world where effective communication is key to delivering successful products, Ditto is positioning itself as an indispensable tool for modern product teams.
